:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
::: {.callout}
Reports will not include data or findings from archived models.^[[Archive and delete models](/guide/model-inventory/archive-delete-models.qmd)]
:::

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa square-poll-vertical >}} Analytics**.

1. Click on the tab for the type of reports you want to review.

1. For each of the bar or pie charts, hover for numerical breakdowns or click on individual sections to get a more detailed view.

    For example, to see all findings related to specific risk area:

    a. Click on the **Validation Issues** tab.
    b. Under **Validation Issues by Risk Area**, click on the risk area you want more details for.
    c. On the page that opens, the applicable findings are listed:
        - Filter this list of findings^[[Filter and sort artifacts](/guide/model-validation/view-filter-artifacts.qmd#filter-and-sort-artifacts)]
        - Or customize column headers that display on this findings view^[[Customize artifact layouts](/guide/model-validation/customize-artifact-layouts.qmd)]
    d. To get more details on the finding itself, click on the title of the finding to take you to the **{{< fa triangle-exclamation >}} Model Findings** section for the specific model the finding applies to.

::::
